credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions: Other (envelope, 2 detached sides): 10.2 x 15.2 cm (4 x 6 in.)
title: Letter from Maurice Prendergast to Charles Prendergast, Paris [postmark]/ Saint Malo [postmark]
description: Envelope (no letter). Location of the letter is unknown. The two sides may be from two different envelopes: one postmarked "Saint Malo", the other "Paris".
